noteR.para: Before repairing the sealing, check the sealing of the area concernedvehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

procedure.title: preparation operation for repairing the sealing

ul.li: the trim pieces.
the front sliding window run channel front side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000714 or rear side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000713,

the front sliding window exterior weatherstrip front side opening element window exterior weatherstrip : removal - refittingGIEMR-001504 or rear side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000713,
the seal of the pivoting windows,
the clearances and flush fitting of the side windows side window : adjustmentGIEMR-002428,
the opening rear screen seal,
the rear quarter panel window mountings rear quarter glass : removal - refittingGIEMR-002413,
the opening rear screen mountingsopening rear screen window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002415.

noteR.para: If the seals are dirty, clean them with soapy water vehicle sealing : general informationGIEMR-002468.

ul.li: the seal.
NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing in the area windows : sealing checkGIEMR-002405.

procstep.para: Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.
NO: fault resolved.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of bonded windows

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the bonded windows has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

procstep.para: If the mastic of the bonded windows is faulty:

ul.li: remove the windows windscreen : removal - refittingGIEMR-001701 or rear quarter glass : removal - refittingGIEMR-002413 or opening rear screen window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002415,
re-apply the window bonding range window bonding : descriptionGIEMR-000562 (Technical Note 0560A) or roof opening element bonding : descriptionGIEMR-000561 (Technical Note 0560A).

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the bonded window windows : sealing checkGIEMR-002405.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of sliding windows

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the sliding windows has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

a) if the sliding mobile window channel is deformed or cut, replace the sliding window run channelfront side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000714 or rear side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000713,

b) if the panelwork is deformed in the fitting zone of the mobile window channel, flatten the contact zone, check the channel, replace the channel if necessary front side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000714 or rear side opening element window run channel : removal - refittingGIEMR-000713.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the mobile windowwindows : sealing checkGIEMR-002405.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of hinged windows

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the hinged windows has been checked?
NO: move on to the next step.

ul.li: a) if the seal of the mobile window is deformed or cut, replace the mobile window seal,
b) if the panelwork is deformed in the fitting zone of the mobile window seal, flatten the contact zone, check the seal of the mobile window, replace the mobile window seal if necessary,

c) if the mountings and hinges of the mobile window are deformed, replace the mountings and hinges of the mobile windowrear quarter glass : removal - refittingGIEMR-002413 or rear side opening element window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002412 or opening rear screen window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002415.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the hinged window windows : sealing checkGIEMR-002405.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of fitted windows

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the hinged windows has been checked?

ul.li: a) if the seal of the fitted window is deformed or cut, replace the fitted window seal,
b) if the panelwork is deformed in the contact zone of the fitted window seal, flatten the contact zone, check the seal and replace the seal if necessary,

c) if the fitted window seal does not present any faults, apply window sealing mastic between the seal and the panel and between the seal and the window sealing tooling : descriptionGIEMR-001613,sealing tooling : useGIEMR-001614 and bodywork sealing product : descriptionGIEMR-001821.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the fitted windowwindows : sealing checkGIEMR-002405.
